name: Christmas Rush (RedMolo)
description:
You are Dad.

You have no gifts!

You need to get the right gifts and get to the check out before the shop closes and Christmas is ruined.

If only you'd brought that list your wife left!

A and D to move left and right. Space to brake and use the mouse to pull those gifts off the shelf

Includes - Local Forecast Elevator by Kevin Macleod of Incompetech
